entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 10:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near noon. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 12.
